meaningMnemonic: A <radical>bamboo</radical> <radical>tsunami</radical> uses its <radical>drop</radical>s to carry out its <radical>specialty</radical>, which is turning itself into <kanji>record book</kanji>s.
readingMnemonic: A <kanji>record book</kanji> is a <reading>bo</reading>ok (ぼ), when it comes down to it.
